description: He delighted fans with encores including the Teresa Teng hit The Moon Represents My Heart and the Indonesian classic Bengawan Solo. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: Pianist George Harliono displays range and charisma in solo recital
title_page: Concert review: Pianist George Harliono displays range and charisma in solo recital | The Straits Times
